---
title: "buoy_weight"
author: "Hayden Vega"
date: "2024-10-29"
output: html_document
description: An rmd with buoyant weight analysis of corals collected for the fish-regen project. buoy_data is raw buoyant weight data, and coral_delta is the data for final-initial values for variables buoyant_weight_g, dry_mass, and . 
---

```{r}
library("tidyverse")
library("readxl")
library("janitor")
library('readxl')
library("here")
```

```{r}
buoy_data <- read.csv("../data/fish_regen_buoyantweight (1).csv")
coral_delta <- read.csv("../data/coral_delta.csv")
```

```{r}
buoy_data%>% 
  mutate(density_stopper = (air_weight_g * 0.9965)/(air_weight_g - fresh_weight_g))%>%
  mutate(density_sw = (air_weight_g - salt_weight_g)/ (air_weight_g / density_stopper))%>%
  mutate(dry_mass = bouyantweight_g / (1 - (density_sw/density_aragonite)))%>%
  mutate(coral_vol = (dry_mass / (density_aragonite - density_sw))) -> skeletal.mass 
```
# graph buoyant data
```{r}
log_data <- buoy_data %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = date, values_from = bouyantweight_g, id_cols = coral_id) %>%
  filter(coral_id != 45)

log_data %>% 
  ggplot(aes(initial, final))+
  geom_point()

0.991493 + .002019 * 2


#This graph 
skeletal.mass %>% 
  ggplot(aes(date, bouyantweight_g, color = fish, fill = wound))+
  geom_boxplot()

```
#graph change of drymass and volume
```{r fig.width = 5, fig.height = 5}

coral_delta %>% 
  ggplot(aes(fish, dry_mass_delta, color = wound))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 2))

```

```{r}
coral_delta %>% 
  ggplot(aes(fish, vol_delta, color = wound))+
  geom_boxplot()+
  coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 2))
```
